V.iii.2.B.4.b
.
SC of Vertigo
Vertigo is generally considered a symptom of another disability, such as a peripheral vestibular disorder or a brain disorder. Â However SC can be granted for vertigo as provided in
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 12.A.1.e
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B - Conditions of the Auditory System
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B
